snippet: Felix Baumgartner will try to become the first sky diver to break the sound barrier when he steps off a balloon-borne capsule 22 miles above the Earth.
abstract: Professional daredevil Felix Baumgartner will try to become the first sky diver to break the sound barrier when he steps off a balloon-borne capsule 22 miles above the Earth; Joe Kittinger, a retired Air Force colonel who has held the altitude and speed records since 1960, will be guiding Baumgartner via radio during his two-hour ascent to the stratosphere.
lead_paragraph: Felix Baumgartner will try to become the first sky diver to break the sound barrier when he steps off a balloon-borne capsule 22 miles above the Earth.

headline.seo: ‘Fearless Felix’ Baumgartner to Try to Become First Sky Diver to Break Sound Barrier
headline.main: Daredevil Sets Sight on a 22-Mile Fall
headline.print_headline: Daredevil Sets Sight On a 22-Mile Fall
